text: "Don't Come Cryin' to Me" is a song co-written and recorded by American country music artist Vince Gill. It was released in January 1999 as the third single from the album The Key. The song reached No. 27 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Gill and Reed Nielsen ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (1999) !Park position |- |- |- |Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|24 |} ==References== Category:1999 singles Category:1998 songs Category:Vince Gill songs Category:Songs written by Vince Gill Category:Songs written by Reed Nielsen Category:Song recordings produced by Tony Brown (record producer) Category:MCA Nashville Records singles
title: Don't Come Cryin' to Me
